snippet: Nest, the company founded by the former Apple designer Tony Fadell, has a new version of its self-learning thermostat coming out this month. The company said it had upgraded both the hardware and software of the device to make it thinner, smarter and...
abstract: Nest, the company founded by the former Apple designer Tony Fadell, has a new version of its self-learning thermostat coming out this month. The company said it had upgraded both the hardware and software of the device to make it thinner, smarter and more compatible with different heating and cooling systems.

headline.main: Nest, the High-Tech Thermostat, Gets Slimmer and Smarter
